entry.title: Personal Professional Develop Plan
entry.content:
Skill List(ordered by priority):

1. University Tasks

All the tasks are distributed to each day. Highest Priority, other stuff follow after this.

1.1 Embedded system, board design, etc.

EDA, DSP, EES, Smeagol

1.2 Other courses.

like Ad hoc networks, Japanese, TA, DSP. Finish all the homeworks and catch up to progress.

2. German

Read an article each day and learn new words.

3. Programming

Learn the programming via Codecademy or by other means.

3.1 Java

Need to learn quite fast and practice by an Android application.

3.2 Python

Same with Java and practice with a linux/Windows GUI program.

3.3 Practice C++/C Programming

Do the Leetcode questions and afterwards Hackerrank. Read algorithm books.

Spare time

Violin practice.

Play tennis

Guitar Practice

entry.title: Here comes Naiqus!
entry.content:
This is the first post. I will write all my study progress, ideas and some segment of my life.

And start filling myself, seriously! XD
